content: Contact link copied successfully. The link is valid for 7 days.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a success message when a contact link is successfully copied. It will appear in a notification area, likely after a button click or confirmation action. The message should indicate that the link is valid for 7 days, providing context for users who may need to share it again soon.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The strong tag is correctly applied, but inconsistent with the English version. While functionally correct, maintaining consistency with the English source would improve UX.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using the same HTML tag (strong) or equivalent formatting style as the English version for consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'valid for 7 days' is translated as 'валиден 7 дни'. A more natural and accurate translation would be 'валиден за 7 дни'.
The strong tag is not closed correctly. The English uses , while the Finnish uses
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Correct the closing strong tag to

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'valid for 7 days' is not accurately translated. 'վավեր է 7 օր' translates more literally to 'valid for 7 days' but in this context, a better translation would convey the concept of 'active for 7 days' or 'usable for 7 days'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'աշխատում է 7 օր' or 'գործող է 7 օր' to better convey the meaning of the English text.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຄະນະໂຄງການຕິດຕໍ່ຖືກສໍາເນົາຢ່າງສໍາເລັດຜົນ" doesn't accurately translate "Contact link copied successfully."  'ຄະນະໂຄງການຕິດຕໍ່' translates to 'Project contact' which is not the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use a phrase that more directly conveys the action of copying a contact link, such as 'ລິ້ງຕິດຕໍ່ຖືກສໍາເນົາຢ່າງສໍາເລັດຜົນ' (Link contact copied successfully).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The strong tag is correctly replicated in the Lao translation, however the English content uses `<strong/>` while the Lao uses `<strong/>`. While this is a minor issue it is important to maintain consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistency in tag formatting across all translations. Both versions should consistently use `<strong/>`.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'valid for 7 days' is not perfectly translated. 'Valabil numai timp de 7 zile' is a bit more restrictive and suggests the link is *only* valid for 7 days, which might not be the intended nuance. A more accurate translation might be 'valabil pentru 7 zile'.
The phrase "giá trị" (value) doesn't accurately translate "valid" in this context. It implies a monetary or appraised value, not the timeframe of validity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Liên kết này có hiệu lực trong 7 ngày.
